scripts.build: npm run build:corgi && npm run build:tsc
scripts.postbuild: cd src && find . -name '*.json' -type f -exec cp {} ../dst/{} \; && cd ..
scripts.pack: cp package.json package-lock.json dst/ && cd dst && npm ci --production && npm ls && find . -name "*.d.ts" | xargs rm && find . -name "*.js.map" | xargs rm && rm -Rf ./node_modules/@types && zip -rqy ../dst.zip . && cd ..
scripts.postpack: node -e "require('fs').statSync('./dst.zip').size > 1024 * 1024 * 50 && [console.log('artifact has to be smaller than 50MB'), process.exit(1)]"
scripts.pretest: npm run build:corgi && npm run build:tsc -- -p ./tsconfig-test.json
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run pack && serverless deploy
